class_description:
This class specifies a parameter spec for RSA-PSS signature scheme,
 as defined in the
 PKCS#1 v2.1
 standard. Its ASN.1 definition in PKCS#1 standard is described below: Note: the PSSParameterSpec.DEFAULT uses the following:
     message digest  -- "SHA-1"
     mask generation function (mgf) -- "MGF1"
     parameters for mgf -- MGF1ParameterSpec.SHA1
     SaltLength   -- 20
     TrailerField -- 1

params.param_description: the algorithm name of the hash function.

the algorithm name of the mask generation
 function.

the parameters for the mask generation
 function. If null is specified, null will be returned by
 getMGFParameters().
the value of the trailer field.

Methods.method_description:
Creates a new PSSParameterSpec as defined in
 the PKCS #1 standard using the specified message digest,
 mask generation function, parameters for mask generation
 function, salt length, and trailer field values.

params.param_description:
the length of salt in bits to be used in PKCS#1
 PSS encoding.

Methods.method_description:
Creates a new PSSParameterSpec
 using the specified salt length and other default values as
 defined in PKCS#1.
Returns the message digest algorithm name.

return_description: the mask generation function algorithm name.

Methods.method_description: Returns the mask generation function algorithm name.

return_description: the parameters for the mask generation function.

Methods.method_description: Returns the parameters for the mask generation function.
Returns the salt length in bits.

return_description: the value for the trailer field, i.e. bc in PKCS#1 v2.1.

Methods.method_description: Returns the value for the trailer field, i.e. bc in PKCS#1 v2.1.
